TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HtmlTextWriterAttribute extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the HTML attributes that an or object writes to the opening tag of an HTML element when a Web request is processed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is commonly used with the following methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.GetAttributeName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.IsAttributeDefined%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> enumeration with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A> method to add an `Onclick` attribute to an HTML element and sets its value to ECMAScript code.
[!code-cpp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CPP/htmltextwriter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CS/htmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/VB/htmltextwriter.vb#1)]
